content.rendered:
The Tata Punch is a compact SUV from Tata Motors, launched in India in October 2021. It’s a sub-4 meter SUV that offers a blend of rugged looks, urban practicality, and good performance at an affordable price. The Punch is designed to appeal to young, urban buyers who are looking for a small SUV with modern features and an attractive design.

Here are some key features of the Tata Punch:

  1. Design: The Tata Punch features a bold and upright stance, with sharp lines, a signature grille, and LED DRLs (Daytime Running Lights). It has a muscular SUV appearance but in a compact form.
  2. Interior: The cabin is designed to be spacious for its size, with comfortable seating, a touchscreen infotainment system, and modern features like Apple CarPlay and Android Auto connectivity.
  3. Performance: The Punch is powered by a 1.2-liter, 3-cylinder petrol engine, delivering a good balance of power and fuel efficiency. It offers both manual and automatic transmission options.
  4. Safety: The Punch has been equipped with a host of safety features, including dual airbags, ABS with EBD, rear parking sensors, and an optional electronic stability program (ESP) in higher variants.
  5. Price: The Punch is competitively priced in the entry-level SUV segment, making it an attractive option for buyers seeking a budget-friendly, small SUV with modern features.

tata punch price and mileage details

​The Tata Punch is a compact SUV that combines style, performance, and efficiency. As of March 2025, the ex-showroom prices for the Tata Punch in Chennai are as follows:​

Petrol Variants:

  • Punch Pure: ₹6,19,990​
  • Punch Pure Opt: ₹6,81,990​
  • Punch Adventure: ₹7,16,990
  • Punch Adventure Plus: ₹7,51,990​
  • Punch Adventure Rhythm: ₹7,51,990​
  • Punch Adventure S: ₹7,71,990​
  • Punch Accomplished Plus: ₹8,21,990​
  • Punch Accomplished Plus S: ₹8,51,990​
  • Punch Accomplished Plus Camo Edition: ₹8,61,990
  • Punch Creative Plus: ₹8,81,990​
  • Punch Creative Plus Camo Edition: ₹8,91,990​

CNG Variants:

  • Punch Pure iCNG: ₹7,29,990​
  • Punch Adventure iCNG: ₹7,51,990​
  • Punch Adventure Plus iCNG: ₹7,81,990​
  • Punch Adventure Rhythm iCNG: ₹7,81,990​
  • Punch Adventure S iCNG: ₹8,01,990​
  • Punch Accomplished Plus iCNG: ₹8,51,990​
  • Punch Accomplished Plus S iCNG: ₹8,81,990​
  • Punch Accomplished Plus Camo Edition iCNG: ₹8,91,990​
  • Punch Creative Plus iCNG: ₹9,01,990​
  • Punch Creative Plus Camo Edition iCNG: ₹9,11,990​

Note: These prices are ex-showroom and may vary based on optional features, dealer charges, and other factors. ​

Fuel Efficiency:

The Tata Punch offers commendable fuel efficiency across its variants:​

  • Petrol Manual: 20.09 kmpl​
  • Petrol Automatic: 18.8 kmpl
  • CNG Manual: 26.99 km/kg​

Note: Actual mileage may vary based on driving conditions and maintenance.
